name: Path of the Martyrs (Full Game)
description:
After the passing of the princess of the peaceful land of Delma, her retainer Saiyato Ichia goes to Lidoffad Lab. This lab houses many deadly foes and secrets within its walls. Will Saiyato be able combat all foes and revelations that come his way?

This is the full game of my first long term project that I worked on for 7 months. I am currently looking for play-testers  to try my game out. If you want to try out a demo of the game first you can go to this link: https://kazuki-t126.itch.io/pathofthemartyrs-demo

For one week I will accept donations as low as a dollar if you are so inclined. After that it will be its at's planned price of $2.99 next Friday.

Each time you enter Lidoffad Lab the order you experience each floor will be different.

You will also get different treasure in each run through the game as well.

As you journey through the lab you will slowly discover what led Saiyato to come to Lidoffad Lab.
